clients.title: ABA Announces Launch Of Online Platform to Connect Volunteer Lawyers Across the U.S. with Unaccompanied Immigrant Children Who Need Representation
description: Asylum-seekers who have legal representation have a five-times-greater chance of winning their case. In an effort to help unrepresented immigrant children who face federal deportation, the ABA has launched a new online platform, Pro Bono Matters for Children Facing Deportation, where interested attorneys can now search for unaccompanied immigrant children's cases, connecting them with children who need a lawyer. Click here, for more information and to learn more about the program.
